column4: Can anyone help me with setting a Static IP or ubuntu? i rly don't know what i'm doing when it comes to the IP, i just left it to the assigned one from DHCP but my DHCP is dead and i need to set up the IPs myself but i use ubuntu only and need to know how, can anyone help me with this predicament
well, last time I did it, I right click nm, edited the connections, and there was a dialog for setting a static password
